title: Steam, Itch.io are pulling ‘porn’ games. Critics say it's a slippery slope
author: 6d6b73
aiHeadline: Censorship is just the beginning, apparently, as Steam and Itch.io decide to pull 'porn' games, sparking fears of a slippery slope into a world where fun is outlawed.

title: It's a DE9, not a DB9 (but we know what you mean)
author: jgrahamc
aiHeadline: It's a DE9, not a DB9 (but we know what you mean), because clearly, the difference between a cat and a dog is as obvious as a DE9 and DB9 connector.

title: Do not download the app, use the website
author: foxfired
aiHeadline: Downloading apps? Please, use the website instead—because who needs convenience when you can have a browser window that won't close on its own?

title: Women dating safety app 'Tea' breached, users' IDs posted to 4chan
author: gloxkiqcza
aiHeadline: Women's dating safety app 'Tea' breached, users' IDs posted to 4chan—because nothing says 'safe' like having your info leaked to a place known for anonymity.

title: Show HN: Price Per Token – LLM API Pricing Data
author: alexellman
aiHeadline: Price Per Token – LLM API Pricing Data: Because who doesn't want to know exactly how much it costs to make a computer sound like a human, but only if you're a millionaire.
